00050  *      Description: Structures and external function declarations for

00059 #ifndef L_SOFTPIPE_INT_H
00060 #define L_SOFTPIPE_INT_H
00061 
00062 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00063 #include <config.h>
00064 #include <stdio.h>
00065 #include <stdlib.h>
00066 #include <Lcode/l_main.h>
00067 #include <Lcode/r_regalloc.h>
00068 #include <machine/lmdes.h>
00069 #include <Lcode/sm.h>
00070 #include <machine/m_impact.h>
00071 
00072 #include <Lcode/l_softpipe.h>
00073 #include <Lcode/l_markpipe.h>
00074 #include <Lcode/l_mii.h>
00075 
00076 #include "l_loop_prep.h"
00077 #include "l_pipe_util.h"
00078 #include "l_pipe_rename.h"
00079 #include "l_softpipe_info.h"
00080 #include "l_gen_pipe.h"
00081 
00082 #define SOFTPIPE_OP_INFO(oper) ((Softpipe_Op_Info *)(oper->ext))
00083 #define IMPOSSIBLE_PRIORITY -100        /* No oper should ever have
00084                                            this priority */
00085 
00086 #define Lpipe_ignore_kernel_inst(oper) ((oper->opc == Lop_DEFINE)|| \
00087                                         (oper->opc == Lop_NO_OP))
00088 
00089 /* global vars - arrays of pointers to the first and last oper of
00090      each copy of the kernel code in the unrolled loop.  Copies are
00091      numbered 0 to unroll-1 */
00092 extern L_Oper **kernel_copy_last_op;
00093 extern L_Oper **kernel_copy_first_op;
00094 
00095 /* other global variables */
00096 extern L_Cb *header_cb;         /* this cb becomes the kernel */
00097 extern L_Cb *preheader_cb;      /* original loop preheader */
00098 extern L_Cb *prologue_cb;       /* prologue - there is no global
00099                                    variable for the epilogue because
00100                                    there can be more than one epilogue */
00101 extern L_Cb *remainder_cb;      /* loop for executing remainder
00102                                    iterations for remainder loop code
00103                                    schema */
00104 extern int Lpipe_stage_count;
00105 extern int Lpipe_counted_loop;  /* flag to indicate that current loop is a
00106                                    counted loop without early exits */
00107 extern FILE *sched_file;        /* file to which to print the single
00108                                    iteration schedule for each loop
00109                                    scheduled */
00110 extern int loop_dep_height;
00111 extern int Lpipe_total_issue_slots;
00112 #endif
